inclusion.criterion: Grade 3 (moderate to severe) or Grade 4 (severe) mitral regurgitation (MR)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary regurgitant jet must originate from malcoaptation of the A2 and P2 scallops of the mitral valve
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Does not need other cardiac surgery or any emergency surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Did not experience myocardial infarction in prior 12 weeks or endovascular procedure in prior 30 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Echocardiographic evidence of intracardiac mass, thrombus or vegetation
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, planned for MV repair but lost to follow-up. Now prepared to undergo surgery.
